title: Does Reroll.....
body:
Does rerolling into perm skin give you a better skin than what you used to reroll?

I currently have 2 legendaries and 1 epic which is:
Arcade Miss Fortune
Dunkmaster Darius
The Magnificent Twisted Fate


If I use these 3 skin shards do I get a better skin or do I get a random skin?

Just asking because I don't play those 3 champs much.

replies.body:
The Hextech Crafting is completely random to be fair to everyone.

In my opinion, reroll them if you don't want them, you've got nothing to lose. That or break them down into shards.

If you do like any of those skins, hold onto them.
I dont think so, so I wouldnt.
Would be such a waste if I did.
Considering there a fair amount of orange gems if you scrap them would kinda be a shame if you got like butcher urgot or some other horrible skin

no they don't atm. The point of those skins is to either create them using dust of cheaper skins, or disenchant the expensive ones to get lots of dust and make 2-3 cheap skins.

I personally try to avoid rerolling the high cost skins.
Hopefully they add a feature like this in the future so that those people who get high cost skins and don't use that champion can reroll it into something good.
if you reroll skins that are worth less (on average) than the one you get, you usually get some dust too. Thats the only difference between them right now
